<title level="1" right="Trait">[Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 454 <sup>2.0</sup>

Effects with this trait deal cold damage. Creatures with this trait have a connection to magical cold.
name: Cold
